snippet: António Horta-Osório, the chief executive of Lloyds Banking Group, who waived his 2011 payout, could receive a share bonus of $5.3 million this year, as part of a long-term incentive plan.
abstract: António Horta-Osório, the chief executive of Lloyds Banking Group, who waived his 2011 payout, could receive a share bonus of $5.3 million this year, as part of a long-term incentive plan.

headline.main: Lloyds' Chief Eligible for Share Bonus
